entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Board, ChancellorButton, Official, PlayerCard, PolicyCard, VictoryCard, VotingCard

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Anything that has an image and is drawn is an entity. Most classes inside of the package extend this class
